mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, INDEXID, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURENAME, QUOTE, OPER, CORPID, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, ADDRESS, TEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, QQ, CREATETIME, TYPE, PRODUCTID, MINNUM, REPAIRRATE, PACKAGING, IMPORTRIGHT, SERVE, EVALUATION, LINKMAN, PERSONNUM, PROFESSIONAL, PRICEFIXING, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, WANGWANG, NOTE, INFORMATION, STYLE, ATTESTATION, MANAGEPRODUCT, SURVEYTABLE, MAINMARKET, RESTS, MANUFACTUREURL from db_productandmanufacture where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, INDEXID, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURENAME, QUOTE, OPER, CORPID, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, ADDRESS, TEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, QQ, CREATETIME, TYPE, PRODUCTID, MINNUM, REPAIRRATE, PACKAGING, IMPORTRIGHT, SERVE, EVALUATION, LINKMAN, PERSONNUM, PROFESSIONAL, PRICEFIXING, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, WANGWANG, NOTE, INFORMATION, STYLE, ATTESTATION, MANAGEPRODUCT, SURVEYTABLE, MAINMARKET, RESTS, MANUFACTUREURL from db_productandmanufacture

INDEXID = #{indexid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

QUOTE = #{quote,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

IMPORTRIGHT = #{importright,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SERVE = #{serve,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EVALUATION = #{evaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PERSONNUM = #{personnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PROFESSIONAL = #{professional,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRICEFIXING = #{pricefixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WANGWANG = #{wangwang,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and

INFORMATION = #{information,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
STYLE = #{style,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and

MANAGEPRODUCT = #{manageproduct,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and

MAINMARKET = #{mainmarket,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESTS = #{rests,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
MANUFACTUREURL = #{manufactureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
